WorkflowInfo.Name: Replace specific characters in a text file
WorkflowInfo.Description: Replace specific characters in a text file
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process searches for a given string in a text file and replaces it with another string.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ConvertToPlainText;Assembly=ConvertToPlainText, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReplaceString;Assembly=ReplaceString, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\log1.txt" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="1" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /><ns1:ConvertToPlainText DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" x:Name="convertToPlainText1" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." IsValid="True" Value="%readFile1%" /><ns2:ReplaceString IsValid="True" x:Name="replaceString1" RemoveNewLines="False" FindString="user1" Timeout="00:01:00" ReplaceWithString="user2" SourceString="%convertToPlainText1%" IsMatchCase="False" RemoveSpaces="False" Description="Find and replace a string with another string" RemoveTabs="False" DisplayName="Replace String" TypeName="ReplaceString" /><ns3:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%replaceString1%" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\log1.txt" IsAppend="False" Password="" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
